UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Insight into the mechanism of action of temporin-SHa, a new broad-spectrum antiparasitic and antibacterial agent.
Literature.Author: Raja Z, André S, Abbassi F, Humblot V, Lequin O, Bouceba T, Correia I, Casale S, Foulon T, Sereno D, Oury B, Ladram A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µM),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=>200µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>200µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=>200µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>200µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>200µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>200µM),Staphylococcus aureus ST1065(MIC=>200µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=100µM),Listeria ivanovii(MIC=>200µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>200µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>200µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=>200µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=>200µM)
